item.title: How Does Tallow Balm Help Eczema? Natural Relief for Dry, Irritated Skin
item.description: How Does Tallow Balm Help Eczema? If you’ve struggled with eczema, you know how frustrating it can be—constant dryness, itching, and irritation. Tallow balm NZ is a natural, simple solution that deeply hydrates, calms inflammation, and strengthens the skin barrier. 1. Deep Hydration That Lasts ✔ Mimics the skin’s natural oils → Absorbs deeply and prevents moisture loss. ✔ Rich in essential fatty acids → Keeps skin hydrated for hours.
